### Xenonid Castes
Strain guides can be found attached to their parent caste.
- [textlink="Defender" link="RMCGuideRoleDefender"] - [textlink="Sentinel" link="RMCGuideRoleSentinel"] - [textlink="Runner" link="RMCGuideRoleRunner"] - [textlink="Lurker" link="RMCGuideRoleLurker"] - [textlink="Warrior" link="RMCGuideRoleWarrior"] - [textlink="Hivelord" link="RMCGuideRoleHivelord"] - [textlink="Carrier" link="RMCGuideRoleCarrier"] - [textlink="Burrower" link="RMCGuideRoleBurrower"] - [textlink="Ravager" link="RMCGuideRoleRavager"] - [textlink="Praetorian" link="RMCGuideRolePraetorian"] - [textlink="Boiler" link="RMCGuideRoleBoiler"] - [textlink="Crusher" link="RMCGuideRoleCrusher"] - [textlink="Queen" link="RMCGuideRoleQueen"] - [textlink="Parasite" link="RMCGuideRoleParasite"]
